mcp-google-drive.description: Google Drive MCP Server for file operations using OAuth2 authentication
capabilities: search_files - Search for files using Google Drive's powerful search syntax
get_file - Retrieve file metadata and content
list_files - List files with filtering and pagination
create_file - Create new files in Google Drive
update_file - Update existing file content and metadata
copy_file - Copy files to new locations
share_file - Share files with users and set permissions

authentication.setup_instructions: Set GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET environment variables with your Google OAuth2 credentials
